post.title: dwmX JAN-17 ISO
post.body:
New dwmX ISO available

![2017-01-13-15-11-19-screenshot.jpg (1200x675)](data/img/post_1_2017-01-13-15-11-19-screenshot.jpg)![2017-01-13-15-15-25-screenshot.jpg (1200x675)](data/img/post_1_2017-01-13-15-15-25-screenshot.jpg)![2017-01-13-15-13-49-screenshot.jpg (1200x675)](data/img/post_1_2017-01-13-15-13-49-screenshot.jpg)

dwmX-jessie 64bit
Debian 8.6
dwm-6.1
smxi
ceni network config (sudo ceni)
9menu (Alt+F1)
dmenu-extended (Alt+P)
jgmenu (Alt+z)
spaceFM 1.0.3+next
sublime text 3
glances system monitor
ncmpcpp visualizer
rcconf (sudo rcconf) default=minimum services
boot to ram option
redshift ( ~/.xinitrc, add your geolocation to ~/.config/redshift.conf)
tmux
zsh+prezto
username = live ; password = live ; root pass = live: type 'startx'...
install with 'sudo refractainstaller-yad'
Firefox ESR
mpd lounge radio 'ready to roll'

[https://sourceforge.net/projects/dwmx/](https://sourceforge.net/projects/dwmx/)

[https://mrneilypops.io](https://mrneilypops.io)
